ol.li: From the CIW, select File > Export > LEFâ€¦ (). CIW menu to export LEF

Complete the LEF Out form as shown in , and then click OK. Click OK again for the pop-up that follows; the warnings can be ignored. LEF out form
This creates the LEF file ldk_demo_lib.lef.
Open the file ldk_demo_lib.lef in a text editor to review its contents.
Move the newly created LEF file into the library collateral collection area. The following sections reference this area:mv ldk_demo_lib.lef ./stdcells_1278.ldk_demo_lib/lef
